name: info
description: Provides information about me, and links for adding the bot and joining the support server
embedDescription:
[Skyra](https://skyra.pw) {{VERSION}} is a bot designed to help moderating your server. I use the [Sapphire Framework](https://sapphirejs.dev) for the [Discord.js library](https://discord.js.org).
- [Privacy Policy](https://skyra.pw/privacy) | [Terms of Service](https://github.com/skyra-project/skyra/blob/main/.github/TERMS_OF_SERVICE.md).
